static_questions.question: Tell me about Crown
static_questions.answer:
Crown - 140 exist (3.3%)

Provenance: S-Tier (Most Wanted)

Crown is THE most wanted trait. Not because it's rare—140 isn't that scarce. It's because the community decided Crown = royalty.

Best Crown holder: #2867 (Rank 88, Waifu)

Crown holders are the Royal Club. Community-recognized status. When Tang Gang started, Crown became a symbol organically—through memes, Discord, collective agreement.

Pairs well with: Neckbeard, MOG Glasses, Military Beret

That's provenance you can't manufacture. 👑

Neckbeard is where 'Winners Win' comes from. This is WMC heritage—World Meme Championship culture encoded in a trait.

Best Neckbeard holder: #3796 (Rank 60, Alien Soyjak)

The blade has been studied. Neckbeard + Fedora = Classic Neckbeard combo (only 6 exist).

Pairs well with: Fedora, Crown, Military Beret, $NECKCOIN

Winners win. 🍊

static_questions.question: What is provenance?
static_questions.answer:
Here's the deal:

📈 RARITY = Math
How many exist? Statistical scarcity. Objective.

👑 PROVENANCE = Culture
What does the community value? Cultural significance. Subjective but powerful.

Example: Crown has 140 copies. Not super rare statistically. But Crown is the #1 most WANTED trait because the community decided it means royalty.

Another example: Neckbeard has 184 copies. But it's S-tier provenance because the Neckbeard community built 'Winners Win' culture.

The best NFTs have BOTH low rarity AND high provenance. That's the sweet spot. 🍊

static_questions.question: How do ranking tiers work?
static_questions.answer:
Ranking tiers in Wojak Farmers Plot:

👑 LEGENDARY (Rank 1-42)
Top 1%. The elite. 42 NFTs.

🔥 ELITE (Rank 43-420)
Top 10%. Strong performers. 378 NFTs.

💜 RARE (Rank 421-840)
Top 20%. Above average. 420 NFTs.

💙 UNCOMMON (Rank 841-2100)
Top 50%. Upper half. 1,260 NFTs.

⚪ COMMON (Rank 2101-4200)
Lower 50%. But every piece has something.

Tier matters, but don't sleep on lower ranks—many have 1-of-1 combos hiding. 🍊

static_questions.question: What are all the S-tier traits?
static_questions.answer:
S-tier traits (highest provenance):

👑 HEAD
Crown, Military Beret, Wizard Hat, Fedora, Piccolo Turban, Devil Horns, Clown, Ronin Helmet, Tin Foil Hat

👔 CLOTHES
Straitjacket, Goose Suit, Wizard Drip, Piccolo Uniform, El Presidente, Ronin, Pepe Suit, Pickle Suit, Drac

👓 FACE WEAR
MOG Glasses, Wizard Glasses, Cyber Shades, VR Headset, Fake It Mask, Hannibal Mask, Matrix Lenses, Laser Eyes

🧔 MOUTH
Neckbeard, Tyson Tattoo

🌍 BACKGROUND
$BEPE, $HONK, $NECKCOIN, Moon, Hell, Heaven, Matrix

These aren't always the rarest—but they're the most WANTED. 🍊

static_questions.question: How many 1-of-1 combos exist?
static_questions.answer:
1-of-1 combo stats:

💎 Total unique 2-trait combos: 1,937

That means 1,937 NFTs have at least one trait pairing that exists NOWHERE else in the collection.

Even an NFT ranked #3500 might have a 1-of-1 combo. That's the hidden gem factor.

The rarest pairings often involve:
• S-tier traits + unusual backgrounds
• Heritage bases + rare face wear
• Named combo pieces + unexpected additions

Every NFT has a fingerprint. 🍊
